Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that has been meticulously crafted for its exceptional quality and functionality. This item holds significant worth to me, reflecting years of dedication and expertise in its creation. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $1200000. This is a limited-time offer, designed to ensure you have the best possible experience with our product without compromising on its inherent value. I believe that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing you with unparalleled benefits and satisfaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, or if you require any further information to make an informed decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
